phrases: Back in those days, to travel meant to risk your life.
You could get lost or robbed.
Injuries or illnesses could easily prove fatal.
So it was not uncommon for travelers to vanish without trace.
But I still want to dance
Someday, one day my passion's fire will
One day the flames would die out
Hey, I thought I did not need anything
But even now, I am so serious
I still have time to make it
Ah... but I am going to burn it up, baby
Sorry darling, it is not that easy
But surely it is not that bad either
I am going to burn it up, yeah
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
I am going to burn it up, yeah
How else could you fight a monster like you just did?
You should not let it go to waste.
Do you go around slaying monsters?
How is that sword fixed to your arm?
It fell off your face, and some new skin grew.
but your new skin is real, is not it?
What, you do not want to talk to me?
I am sorry, I will get off your case.
You should not eat it raw.
It would be even better with salt.
Sometimes it seems like you really cannot see.
You cannot hear or talk, either.
You are so strange, you know that?
Do not you want to make some money?
Leave it to me, and I will make you rich.
You could even be a millionaire.
You think so too, that is why you do not shoo me away.
Hyakkimaru could not see nor hear Dororo.
But there was something he could see ever since he was born.
The fire of the soul, shall we say.
Hostility, hatred, and beings not of this world.
Hyakkimaru detected such dangers by their colors.
As well as this power, he also possessed superhuman senses and strength.
This was how he survived the darkness in which he lived.
only because the color of his soul did not indicate danger.
This small one's for me because I cooked it for you.
This soul did not pass him by, but remained close.
It was the second soul to do so.
Did I say something in my sleep?
Cannot you at least tell me your name?
I just heard about something that we could make money with.
It seems like there is a monster haunting a village.
Villagers and travelers who stop by disappear now and then.
You are going to beat it like you did before and get a reward.
We save people and get money doing it.
Seems like a pretty rich village.
There is really a monster here?
Do not assume I do not know.
We heard you are in trouble.
Got some great news for ya.
This guy right here is the best at slaying monsters.
Just the other day, he beat up this huge monster into little bits.
I saw it with my own eyes.
Cannot hurt to give us a shot.
If you will slay it for us, the village will do much to repay you.
I like the way you talk, Chief.
I am just filling in for the chief.
She has injured her legs and cannot move.
Anyways, please feel free to stay at my home.
I do not have much to offer, but would you like some supper?
I really like the way you talk.
I have not eaten so much for ages.
But they are pretty flashy for a village troubled by a monster.
They do not have a lot of rice paddies, either.
How do they make so much money?
In front of you, get him!
Hold on, you will get what you want.
Yeah, but we let it go for today.
Do not worry, we can handle it.
Lady Bandai wishes to meet you two.
Yes, sorry we have not even prepared your breakfast yet.
It is really dark in here.
Forgive me for being like this.
I am Bandai, the chief of this village.
Do I have something on my face, child?
N-No, it is just you are really pretty.
Forgive me for calling you to me.
I heard about you from the villagers and had to meet you.
I thought you might be, and I was right.
-He is got a sword for an arm!
Stop it, she is no monster.
And you did not do anything to last night's monster.
You really cannot see, can ya!
I am glad to have some companions.
Did you get caught too, Priest?
I heard there was a monster so I came to see, and they locked me up in my sleep.
It could be a clue to where all the people disappeared.
But anyways, I have seen you before somewhere.
We see some things people with sight cannot see.
Sometimes, it is much more accurate, too.
You see things we cannot see?
For example, you look like a clear white flame to me.
We see what is on the inside, not the outside.
You mean this Mr. No-name can see the way you do too?
So when he drew his sword back there...
Do not worry, we cannot see anyway.
It seems like this well is connected to the outside.
There is your friend right there.
Have you come to attack me again?
We only see what is inside of you.
What I see now is the murky color of blood.
It is too bad I could not eat you the first time.
I am sure you have realized it, but this is something worse than a ghoul.
Hey, why did you let it get away!
What the heck is going on?
You knew about it, did not you?
You knew, and you fed the travelers to it.
I had to, or else it would have eaten up the villagers.
That is why you wanted us to slay it, right?
If we defeat it, then your problem's solved.
It seems like it was not Bandai that he wanted slayed.
To think you were still alive.
It must be because it failed to take you.
It was the only one that could not get you.
Have you come to get the rest back?
Let us see if you can...
The money of the travelers you let Bandai eat, right?
Our village has nothing to make money with.
We thought everything was lost when the monster Bandai took over.
But the first traveler Lady Bandai ate had a lot of road money on him.
Is that sound what you wanted us to slay?
It is the sound of the bell that the first traveler carried...
Sorry for saying that stuff to you when you tried to kill Bandai.
I was the one who was blind.
Do not let it get to you.
It is natural for those with sight to be tricked.
Stop treating me like a kid, you No-name!
Hey Priest, what did he write?
No wonder I remember seeing you.
It was you on the river.
Yes, they have increased the number of soldiers on guard.
The Sakai Clan are our allies, not just our neighbors.
I need you to investigate something.
